content:
You're still enjoying "The Hating Game"! I'm so glad to hear that! It's a fantastic book, and I'm not surprised you're loving it. The banter between Lucy and Joshua is just so much fun to read!

At 100 pages in, you're getting to the good stuff! The tension between Lucy and Joshua is really starting to build, and their interactions are getting more and more heated. I won't give away any spoilers, but let's just say that things are about to get very interesting...

What do you think of Lucy and Joshua's characters so far? Do you have a favorite moment or quote from the book that's stood out to you?
